overview: A humanity and action drama where the landlady of "Momogiya" struggles. Tsukiko, who succeeded a long-established ryokan, Momokiya, as a female general from her former grand landlord, but her management continues to become difficult. Is it possible to rebuild the management of the ryokan as well as to revive this dark, hot spring town? !!
title: Momoki-ya ryokan sôdô-ki
